entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
